attributes.action: Review the fairness of how GCSEs, Alevels and Btecs are rewarded in 2021 & 2022
attributes.additional_details: Form a committee of educational specialists, teachers, and representatives from exam boards to look at and model potential solutions to ensure no student is disadvantaged due to Covid-19.
attributes.background: Look at how isolation, access to technology for remote learning, students with SEND etc have been impacted and how students at a school, regional and national level and how the awarding of grades can fairly reflect this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Work with regulators and exam providers to clarify exam arrangements for 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312570

Award 2021 grades based on 50:50 of teacher assessment and exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554171

Ensure all 2021 examinations are based on teacher assessment only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549147
